name: Reverie Saga: A Queenly Quest
description:
Reverie Saga is a new independent game alpha from Seagull Fish Entertainment.

This first chapter tells the story of Princess Trinket, and the trials she must face the night before her coronation.  The people of Pillow Place love and adore the princess, but not everyone wants her as their next queen...

The Countess is the current ruler of the kingdom, and she will stop at nothing to keep her power.  

Can the princess liberate Pillow Place from her wicked stepmother The Countess, or will she fall prey to the deadly fairy tale creatures roaming the countryside at night?

Play now and find out!

"Reverie Saga is possibly one of the most beautiful and unique games I've ever played. It has a superbly premium indie feel with a highly unique hand-drawn art style. You can tell it is a labour of love from a true artist"

-Robin Gray, Gaymingmag.com Founder

                                                        

-Hand-illustrated Art in Paper Doll Art Style

-Emotionally Engaging Storyline with unlockable secrets

-Action Adventure Gameplay with RPG Elements

                                                                           

-2.5D Gameplay with Interactive Perspective Changes

-Unlockable Weapons/Character Skins/ Customizable Upgrades

-Interactive Puzzles Integrated into the Storyline

-New Playable Characters/Expansive Narratives

  REVERIE SAGA is currently in alpha.

That means we need your help to finish the project and bring it to market!

Help us beta test in the comments, or support the project with a donation.
